title: Kore Mo Brocon No Uchi Desu Ka?
alternative_title: Kore mo Burakon no Uchi desu ka? ; Brother Complex? ; Is this the kind of Brother complex? ; Kore mo Brocom no Uchi desu ka? ; Kore mo Brocon no Uchi desu ka? ; This Is Taking Brotherly Love Way Too Far ; これもブラコンのうちですか？ ; 冷静点我是你哥，这样不好吧？ ; 이것도 브라콤인가요?
status: Kore mo Burakon no Uchi desu ka? ; Brother Complex? ; Is this the kind of Brother complex? ; Kore mo Brocom no Uchi desu ka? ; Kore mo Brocon no Uchi desu ka? ; This Is Taking Brotherly Love Way Too Far ; これもブラコンのうちですか？ ; 冷静点我是你哥，这样不好吧？ ; 이것도 브라콤인가요?
description:
Description :
        Haruhi's sick of being bossed around by his younger stepbrother, Akito, and tells him he's had enough. Haruhi's too nice, though. Upon seeing Akito's sad expression, he tries to console his brother, only for Akito to kiss him right then and there! Haruhi's never seen Akito so desperate. Akito doesn't hate him!?

...But, why show it with a kiss!? Akito's behavior escalates, and Haruhi's still not sure what's going on in his brother's head. This is a romantic comedy about two stepbrothers in a taboo relationship. One's besotted yet stand-offish, and the other's entirely at his mercy!
